Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to illustrate communication over a distance.
The student can show how the telephone uses sound to send messages between students.
The student can label or illustrate the string and cups to highlight how the device works.
The student can correctly draw how information (sound) travels through the string.
The student can demonstrate that the design uses the materials provided to communicate over a distance.
The student can show that the device is intended to solve the problem of communicating over a long distance without modern technology.
The student can illustrate or note how such a device might influence human communication by showing how it connects people.
